text:
1. Please re-test with an up-to date version (7.0.42 or 7.0.47).

2. The DefaultServlet uses "sendfile" feature to send files larger than 48kb if connector announces that it supports such a feature.

You can disable sendfile support on <Connector>.

http://tomcat.apache.org/tomcat-7.0-doc/config/http.html
https://issues.apache.org/bugzilla/show_bug.cgi?id=55806#c1

creator: conquer0715@163.com
